Yes the quality is pretty bad but watchable -- can't really make out the titles but I highly recommend it regardless. It's one of the best docu's I have seen on this subject. I ordered the DVD as a gift to my sis in England. It's only about $25 w shipping and I will no doubt order one for myself - it's THAT good!!!
This movie is the largest collection of pseudo-scientific, semi-religious crap I've ever seen.
